original_text: Josiah did things that the Lord said were right. He lived in the good ways of his ancestor, King David. He did not turn away from the Lord's teaching in any way. Kings 21 Kings 23
korean_text: 요시야가 여호와 보시기에 정직히 행하여 그의 조상 다윗의 모든 길로 행하고 좌우로 치우치지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Josiah did things that the Lord said were right
sentences.korean_translation: 요시야는 여호와께서 옳다고 하신 일들을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: He lived in the good ways of his ancestor, King David
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 조상 다윗 왕의 선한 길에서 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: He did not turn away from the Lord's teaching in any way
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와의 가르침을 조금도 떠나지 않았습니다
